helpItems.title: ar How can I change my edition?
helpItems.shortAnswer: ar There are three editions of Bible in One Year; Classic, Youth, and Express. You can change your edition in the app settings
helpItems.detailedAnswer:
ar Detailed answer 

There are three editions of Bible in One Year; Classic, Youth, and Express. You can change your edition in the app settings

There are three editions of Bible in One Year; Classic, Youth, and Express. You can change your edition in the app settings

helpItems.title: ar How long are audio files stored on my phone?
helpItems.shortAnswer: ar Files that have been automatically downloaded are automatically deleted after you have listened to them. If you have manually downloaded audio tracks, these need to be deleted manually.
helpItems.detailedAnswer:
ar Detailed answer

Files that have been automatically downloaded are automatically deleted after you have listened to them. If you have manually downloaded audio tracks, these need to be deleted manually.

Files that have been automatically downloaded are automatically deleted after you have listened to them. If you have manually downloaded audio tracks, these need to be deleted manually.
